articles.title: University funding model leaves students scrambling
articles.description: University funding model leaves students scrambling. University Funding Model continues to dominate Kenyan policy discourse as stakeholders weigh in on the implications for ordinary citizens.
articles.content: University funding model leaves students scrambling. The University Funding Model has been a subject of intense debate across Kenya. Analysts say the policy will have significant implications for the education sector. Various stakeholders including civil society groups, business associations, and county governments have expressed diverse opinions on the matter.
